data.title: Jan Hlavica - Men's Soccer
data.meta_description: Jan Hlavica (2) Defender  - 2017: Received Second Team CoSIDA Academic All-American laurels... Bestowed with Second Team All-SSC award for his play on the defensive
data.text:
2017: Received Second Team CoSIDA Academic All-American laurels... Bestowed with Second Team All-SSC award for his play on the defensive third of the pitch... Garnered nods on both the Fall Sunshine State Conference Commissioners and FIT Athletic Director Honor Roll with a 4.0 GPA... Played in 14 games, started 13, during which he tallied three goals and two assists for eight points on the season... Took 14 shots with six shots on goal... Found the back of the net against Shorter (Sep. 4), Lynn (Oct. 18) and Rollins (Oct. 24).

2016: Selected to Fall Sunshine State Conference Commissioner's Honor Roll with a 4.0 GPA... Named to FIT Athletic Director's Honor Roll... Received All-SSC Honorable Mention... Accumulated 14 shots and three shots on goal... Started all 16 games played.

2015: Started in all 15 games as a freshman...recorded two goals...notched first career goal in season opener against Union (Tenn.) (9/4)...tallied 13 shots, seven on goal...named to Fall Sunshine State Conference Commissioner's Honor Roll...placed on FIT Athletic Director’s Honor Roll.

Personal: Son of Martin Hlavica and Simona Hlavicova...has an older brother, Martin...chose FIT for the opportunity to explore a new country and culture, while still having the ability to play soccer and receive a good eduaction.
